item.title: Hims, Block, and NRG Just Launched Huge Stock Buybacks
item.description: Buyback capacity just got a big-time boost at Hims, Block, and NRG Energy. The three firms authorized more than $8 billion in buybacks combined.

item.title: Retail Earnings Roundup: Walmart Scores, Target Slumps in Q3
item.description: Retail earnings showed significant variance in performance among some of the industry's biggest players. See who won and who lost in Q3.

item.title: JPMorgan and Goldman Upgrade MP Materials Amid Defense-Driven Demand Outlook
item.description: MP Materials stock looks poised for a rebound as analysts see major upside and strategic importance in U.S. defense and rare-earth supply chains.
